name: Olive Oil Shampoo w/panthenol 8.0 oz
description: All Products This EVOO Shampoo is mild, low sudsing and it soothes and smoothes hair. It improves hair's elasticity and helps to prevent split ends while minimizing scalp irritation. Infused with aloe vera and panthenol for their soothing properties, this shampoo leaves hair feeling soft, shiny, and manageable. Works great on natural hair but also for most hair types. For best results, pair with our Naturally soft pH-balancing hair conditioner.
